name: Jordan Gee
text: Honestly one of the best experiences. Always kind, people don’t give this crew enough credit! They’re clearly a small town pizza place and I’m always greeted with the same smiling faces. Been coming here for probably 2 years, very over due …More

text: This pizza hut is great your manager Taylor is amazing she's very hands on, takes the time to listen to our orders, she's friendly to. Today Kelsi was my wife and my waitress she also is great, she was good at refilling are drinks, making …More

Yummy is the word H and every pizza is made to your liking I also  Surf salads and sandwiches with the drinks and fries.
Oh I really love the stuff crust pizza. Yummy

text: The best pizza hut around. Taylor's the manager is great, friendly and we absolutely luv ur food. We will be back soon

name: Kate Cedeno
text: Was hesitant due to lack of people but glad we did. Only 1 part of our order wasn't up to par but they quickly fixed the problem and with great customer service. Would definitely come back.

name: Stephen Cassady
text: We arrived just as they started putting out the buffet so wasn’t much at first. But more came. Enjoyed the food.

name: Bubba
text: Ordered a decent amount of food to find hair on my wings and breadsticks. Pretty cool.

name: D Sci-Fi Writer
text: We had the lunch special & the meal was great for $8.99 each!

name: Steve The Bartender
text: They have okay pizza, I suppose. There's better pizza in the area though, like Genovas which is right across the street. Also, in terms of their chicken condition, they don't have any, which may be a reason this specific location has low reviews. Then again who even likes Pizza hut anymore?

name: Brian Partridge
text: Pretty convenient spot to stop at when returning to the Hampstead/Manchester area from the city.  Sale prices are fair and you can order online/via the app and give a time when you want it ready - they are usually pretty punctual with the requested time.  Nothing stood out as amazing, average national pizza chain

name: Kenneth Lynch
text: Ordered a large pizza with pepperoni and sausage and banana peppers added to half.  Got home and found half sausage and pepperoni and half bell peppers. Tried to call and could not get through. How do you have a business without phone?  Positive side...it was a large pizza

name: karen spigone
text: Such a friendly atmosphere,  always greeted nicely. Have ordered pick-up, and delivery. Also, best salad dressings-- my favorite creamy Italian!

name: kat LeDuc
text: The general manager taylor is amazing!! She is super kind and thoughtful, making me a very happy guest at her store

name: The Alts
text: Taylor is the hardest working girl at Pizza Hut. She's always smiling and will do whatever it takes to make your visit the best it can possibly be.

name: Susan Bond
text: A little expensive but the deals are good for the best pizza in town

name: rae gruder
text: Great people, good food!

name: Steve Piechocki
text: Pizza always great, but the table was sticky and there was long black hair on the plates.

name: Becci Simons
text: The food was cold and service with slow. Then management wanted to argue on whether or not are pizza was cold.  I won't be going back anytime soon.

name: Annie Elizabeth
text: I went there last night with my sister and ordered mozzarella sticks with marinara sauce on the side. The marinara sauce was extremely hot and burning my sisters mouth. I informed our waitress who just gave me a blank stare and basically …More

text: Pizza was hot, wings were tasty...a good day!

name: Samuel Heir
text: Every time I eat pizza hut pizza I get sick. It's too greasy and I always order a pan pizza with just cheese and it's disgusting.  The wings are great but it doesnt make up for everything else. Overall avoid any pizzahut and go to pie 5 or even papa John's.

name: Jason Nelson
text: I mostly order delivery after 9, the food is usually amazing and gets here quick. Plus the people are extremely friendly and eager to make the food how you like it a lil extra sauce, light on that, extra crispy on this etc.

name: Charlie B.
text: I get my cavatini hot. I'm happy.

text: GM manager currently there uses profanity at her associates and acts in a very unprofessional manner including but not limited to talking down to her associates in front of customers. Also getting mad at a new server for serving anothers …More

name: Josh Schwartz
text: It's Pizza Hut.  This location has great friendly staff, they've never messed up an order, and they're delivery is pretty fast.  That being said, if you go to Pizza Hut because you love the pan pizza with it's soft doughyness, and that …More
